title: Niecy Nash on Confidence
description:
Niecy Nash stunned the world in August with her fabulous wedding to singer Jessica Betts. But the Emmy Award-winning actress-comedian has been stopping the show since long before that, with roles on the TV shows Clean House, Reno 911, The Mindy Project, Claws, and many others, along with movies like Selma and the Netflix limited series When They See Us. Nash talks with InStyle editor-in-chief Laura Brown about the relentless inner drive that has taken her all the way to the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
